embeds.title: PADOJRP Control Manual
embeds.description: This Guide contains all relevant commands and keybind for use on the PADOJRP FiveM Server.

fields.name: **Emergency Services**
fields.value:
/911 <message> - Call for 911
/onduty - PD and EMS Onduty Command
/bk <1|2|3|99> - Call for Backup
/jailme <time> - Jail yourself (seconds)
/jail <jail password> <id> <time> - Jail person (seconds)
/unjail <jail password> <id> - Unjail person

fields.name: **Roleplay**
fields.value:
/carry - Carry a player
/emote <emote> - Run Animation
/piggyback - Hop on a players back!
/takehostage - Take a player hostage
/ragdoll - Ragdoll Toggle
/fire - Fire Commands
/shield - Retrieve Shield
/vest <light|medium|heavy> - Take vest from car
/postal <postalcode> - Set waypoint at postal

fields.name: **Utillity**
fields.value:
/report <id> <reason> - Report Players
/website - Community Website
/discord - Community Discord
/rules - Server Rules
/cad - CAD Link
/ooc <message> - Out of Character
/looc <message> - Local Out of Character
/me - Roleplay Action/roll - Roll a die
/text - IC Private Message
/pm - OOC Private Message

fields.name: **Vehicles**
fields.value:
/claim - Claim Vehicle
/engine - Toggle Engine
/lock - Toggle Lock
/unlock - Toggle Lock
/dv - Delete Vehicle
/shuffle - Shuffle to Driver Seat
/tow - Toggle Attach Flatbed
/spotlight - Toggle Spotligt

fields.name: **Admin**
fields.value:
/annouce <msg> - Annouce messages
/admindv - Remove all unoccupied vehicles
/priority - Set 15m Priority cooldown
/resetpcd - Reset priority cooldown
/inprogress - Set priority in progress
/onhold - Set priority on hold
/peacetime - Toggle Peacetime

embeds.title: Keybinds
embeds.description:
F1 - Toggle vMenu
F2 - Toggle Noclip
F3 - Toggle Emote Menu
F5 - Toggle Interaction Menu
F6 - Toggle Scene Menu
F7 - Handsup
F9 - Drop Weapon
K - Toggle Lock
G - Toggle Vehicle Engin
CAPS - Toggle Vehicle Cruise
Q - Toggle Emergency Service Lights
Left Alt - Toggle Siren
Left CTRL + X - Toggle Radar
Left SHIFT + G - Tackle a player
B - Toggle Point
] - Bait Car Pro
Z - Toggle Crouch
Left CTRL - Toggle Prone/Lower Ladder(Vehicle)
Left  SHIFT - Raise Ladder(Vehicle)
H - Release Target (Vehicle)
~ - Toggle Ragdoll
BKSP - Toggle Hazards
= - Toggle Right Turn Signal
- - Toggle Left Turn Signal
U - Toggle Radio
L - Toggle Holster
